name: Arcanum of Toxic Warding
htmlTooltip:
Arcanum of Toxic Warding
Binds when picked up
Requires Level 80
Requires Knights of the Ebon Blade - Honored
Use: Permanently adds 25 Nature resist and 30 Stamina to a head slot item.

Enchanting the item causes it to become soulbound.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 37 50
